Text:
[V] Into Your hands, LORD; I entrust You with my spirit.
[R] Alleluia, alleluia.
[V] For You have redeemed us, LORD, God of truth.
Changes: 2024-01-11 - Constance McIntosh Smith: Implemented her editorial feedback.
2024-01-11 - Paul Prins: Again working on the first line, this feels better.
2023-08-14 - Paul Prins: Updated the versicles to match our Psalm 31:5.
